mapper.select: SELECT user_id,b.belong,file_id,file_name,file_size,file_type,upload_time FROM tb_file as t,tb_belong as b WHERE t.belong_id=b.belong_id AND user_id =#{userId} ORDER BY file_type
SELECT * FROM tb_file WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND hash=#{hash}
SELECT * FROM tb_file WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND belong=#{belong}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_file SET user_id=#{userId}, du_you=#{duYou},file_name=#{fileName},file_type=#{fileType},file_path=#{filePath},file_size=#{fileSize},hash=#{hash},belong_id=#{belongId},upload_time=#{uploadTime},delete_Id=#{deleteId} WHERE file_id=#{fileId}
update tb_file set delete_id=#{deleteId} where file_id=#{fileId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_file( user_id, du_you, file_name, file_type, file_path, file_size, hash, belong_id, upload_time ) VALUES ( #{userId},#{duYou},#{fileName},#{fileType},#{filePath},#{fileSize},#{hash},#{belongId},#{uploadTime} )
